quotes.quote: Bad things happen to good people all the time. It sucks. It's not fair but then much of life isn't fair. It's how you live that matters. It's how you deal with the bumps in the road.
Life is divided into the horrible and the miserable.
The life of man is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish, and short.
Life is not lost by dying; life is lost minute by minute, day by dragging day, in all the thousand small uncaring ways.
Life sucks, but you have the option to sit there and cry about it or you can simply move on and become stronger.
I make a new discovery that totally blows; dying is the easy part. It's coming back to life that sucks.
My life sucks when I'm only half-aware of it. If I quit drinking and saw what it's really like, I'd probably jump off a bridge.
It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything.
Life sucks, but in a beautiful kind of way.
When life sucks, throw yourself into art.
Not everything happens for a reason. Sometimes life just sucks.
I believe pain is nature's way of saying, you're still alive, and life sucks.
Things happen in life and you can't control them. It sucks and you have to move on.
Life isn't a book. There's no guarantee of a happy ending.
Mondays are fine. It's your life that sucks.
Life is an incurable disease.
You fall out of your mother's womb, you crawl across open country under fire, and drop into your grave.
Life is like an onion: you peel off layer after layer and then you find there is nothing in it.
Half the world is composed of idiots, the other half of people clever enough to take indecent advantage of them.
If you think your life sucks, it probably does. Do something about it.
Let's play a game of whose life sucks worse. I'll win, I always win.
Life is amazing. Even when it sucks, it is amazing, and we should be grateful for every moment.
Life is hard. Then you die. Then they throw dirt in your face. Then the worms eat you. Be grateful that it happens in that order.
The world is a grindstone and life is your nose.
Life is little more than a loan shark: It exacts a very high rate of interest for the few pleasures it concedes
Whenever life sucks, remember you're going to die someday.
Life Sucks, get a helmet.
Life may have no meaning. Or even worse, it may have a meaning of which I disapprove.
Life sucks, then you die. Then it sucks again.
When life sucks, read. They can't yell at you for that. And if they do, then you can ignore them.
